intro:
Hello I am Robin, your personal assistant on the go. Swipe left and I'll tell you more!
I can give you directions and traffic alerts, help find nearby food spots and gas stations.
You can also text by voice anytime. I can be on stand-by whenever your are driving, ready to be invoked from your notification drawer.
You will also get an option to activate me, as soon as I can sense you're driving.
To exit, just press the back button, and I'll see you next time! -->
